lines.text: Oh? A fan, here of all places?
Well, thank you for your support.
I must admit, my popularity isn't quite what it once was. Thanks to certain… recent events.
Here, take this—my name card. It includes my website.
You might uncover some of my… darker secrets there.
You'll also find my contact information.
If you ever come across a case you need help with, don't hesitate to send me an email.
You've found my little challenge. Splendid.
It seems my hint didn't go unnoticed. Not bad for an ordinary individual.
I know I sensed something quite…… intriguing about you when we first met.
This might come off as presumptuous, but I need to ask you for a favor.
However, before I get into the details, I must confirm that you have the capability to handle the matter.
The next step has already been unlocked.
I'd advise you to examine very closely to every word on this website.
